changeSet.author: clarysabel

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cvterm WHERE cvterm_id = 1802 AND cv_id = 1041 AND name ='Study Condition';

changeSet.comment: Rename variable type Study Condition to Environment Condition
changeSet.sql: UPDATE cvterm SET name='Environment Condition' WHERE cvterm_id=1802 AND cv_id=1041; UPDATE cvtermprop SET value='Environment Condition' WHERE value='Study Condition' AND type_id=1800;
